channel.title: Whats wrong with this?

item.title: Whats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

so

[code] } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2062; //color dragons

						if(plr.playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1540){
                                             	  hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);
						} else {
						  hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(30);
                                           		  p.stillgfx(1, p.absY + 5, p.absX);
						  plr.sendMessage("You are hurt extra by the dragon's firebreath.");
						}[/code]

@TeleNubby wrote:

It means you used an ‘else if’ statement before using a single ‘if statement’.

item.title: Whats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

i added [code] } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2062; //color dragons

						if(plr.playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1540){
                                             	  hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);
						} else {
						  hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(30);
                                           		  p.stillgfx(1, p.absY + 5, p.absX);
						  plr.sendMessage("You are hurt extra by the dragon's firebreath.");
						}[/code]

but got 2 errors

these were the errors…

NPCHandler.java:1992: 'else' without 'if' } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType = = 941 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53 || npcs[NPCID].n pcType == 54) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2002: 'else' without 'if' else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2 745) { ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

any help would be appreciated :]
